item.description: Hello and welcome to my world ðŸŒŽ I’m a Software Engineering Manager passionate about building loveable, reliable and intuitive products. I like talking about programming, developer workflow and software design principles. I am motivated to help people and teams grow to solve real world technological challenges. All food everything, excites me. I aim to eat at every 3 michillen star restaurant in the world. Spelling is my biggest weakness. After hours you’ll probably find me at your nearest boxing gym, punching some bags.
